name: ai-exam-readiness-checker
description: AI-powered exam readiness checker for high school students

scripts.dev: npm run cleanup && concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.cleanup: lsof -ti:5173 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && lsof -ti:5000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install

author: Your Name
